attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I was disappointed to see i couldn’t use the app, it was to difficult for me to i understand, and it cost me money? I don’t know where the money went, but i was so disappointed because i love President Trump so much and wanted to support him.

attributes.title: Horrible!!
attributes.review: i downloaded it and it absolutely was horrific. my beautiful daughter, susan, downloaded it and was attacked with gun ads and too much graphic content. No one should be downloading this app. It is not user friendly and i felt harassed. don’t download it.. worst app i’ve ever had. no ✨✨😜🙈

attributes.title: Would not recommend
attributes.review: The app was constantly glitching and getting different bugs, it randomly asks for personal information, sketchy and weird adds constantly popped up, and it was all around a bad app. Would NOT EVER recommend.

attributes.title: Angry Conservative
attributes.review: This app is absolutely awful. I would never download it again. The people on this app made my daughter do very awful things. I absolutely would not recommend. I’m very disappointed in our president and how he decided to handle his fans.

attributes.title: Terrible -hacked !?
attributes.review: I thought I was going to get a great app but I was spammed by calls every since I got it , not to mention the quality this apps has to offer.  terrible never again . I guess I’ll have to find something else to vote off of

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: My moms a trump supporter, so I downloaded to see what all the hype was about and this is just horrible. Spammed me with notifications, non stop calls, and so many advertisements. It also asked me for my location, like why does it need my location!!???

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: Ever since I got this app my life has NEVER been the same 😔💔 I keep on getting spam texts and calls. It also won’t stop telling me that Kim Namjoon will become our next president. WHO IN THE HECK IS THIS KIM NAMJOON? I feel like the app keeps on following me. EVEN in my DREAMS. It won’t stop telling me to vote for Kim Namjoon and i HAVE HAD ENOUGH 💔💔 DON’T GET THIS APP. ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE.

attributes.title: Not exactly the best
attributes.review: I was really apprehensive when I downloaded it, looking forward to supporting but when I opened it up, my phone suddenly started to violently electrocute me until I seized on the floor uncontrollably. I would not recommend this to anyone, very sorry 😔

attributes.title: Confused
attributes.review: At first I thought that he was a clown and I was like people want a clown to be president 🤡. It asked if I was racist and if I cared about people I said I’m not racist and I care about people then he spit in my face yelled at me. He was so scary my stuffed animals came to life and started crying the he killed my stuffed animals

attributes.title: Lack of features
attributes.review: You have to enter your email to engage with the app at all, and then you get spammed nonstop with emails and push notifications. App doesn’t give you anything to do once you’ve forked over your information
